mapper.insert: insert into member (seq, email, pw, name ) values (member_seq.nextval, #{email}, #{pw}, #{name})
mapper.select: select * from member where email= #{loginId} and pw= #{loginPw}
mapper.update: update member set pw= #{pw}, name=#{name}, phone=#{phone}, email=#{email}, zipcode=#{zipcode}, address1=#{address1}, address2=#{address2} where id =#{id}
